name: Fireman Capital Partners
overview: Fireman Capital Partners is a private equity firm specializing in buyouts and growth equity. The firm seeks to make investments in the consumer products and services sectors. It also seeks to invest in real estate sector in the Northeast corridor of the United States. Within consumer products and services sector the firm seeks to invest in personal care including oral, hairs, soaps, cosmetics, and toiletries; household care including fabric wash and household cleaners; packaged food and beverages; leisure; apparel; giftware including candles and stationary; clothing including jeans and outdoor; and retailer and distributor catalog businesses. The firm seeks to invest in the companies having an EBITDA between $5 million and $100 million and a target market capitalization between $50 million and $500 million. Fireman Capital Partners was founded in 2008 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts with an additional office in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.
